data.title: A Rafters to A Site Shock Bolt
data.description: This is a good shock dart combo to kill someone planting the bomb on A Site.

data.title: A Screens to A Site Shock Bolt
data.description: This is a good shock dart combo for A Site.

data.title: B Hut To Mid Blue Recon Bolt
data.description: This is useful for scanning players in and around Mid Blue toward Attacker Side Spawn.

data.title: Recon Bolt A Belt Spawn Barriers From A Rafters
data.description: This is useful for scanning players outside of the A Belt Spawn Barriers, either as they push up the right side of A Belt, or right away as they push out of the A Belt Spawn Barriers.

data.title: A Site to A Nest Recon Bolt
data.description: This is a good recon bolt to spot enemies approaching A Site from A Main.

data.title: Mid Boiler to B Kitchen Recon Bolt
data.description: This is a good recon bolt to see if any enemies made it into B Kitchen through the B Tube.
